sec.title: Declaration of Competing Interest
sec.p: The authors have no commercial, proprietary or financial interest in the products or companies described in this article.

sec.title: Author Contributions
sec.p: Conception and design of the study: Cuende N and Pérez-Villares JM. Acquisition of data: all authors. Analysis and interpretation of data: all authors. Drafting or revising the manuscript: Cuende N, Pérez-Villares JM, Álvarez-Márquez AJ and Díaz-Aunión C. All authors have approved the final article.
